nodes.text: Star Wars Legends Epic Collection: The Original Marvel Years Vol. 1

Star Wars Legends Epic Collection: The Original Marvel Years Vol. 1 is an Epic Collection trade paperback that collects issues of Marvel Comics' initial line of Star Wars comics. Some of these comics were previously published in the similarly titled Star Wars: The Original Marvel Years Omnibus Vol. 1 hardcover collection. It was published on November 15, 2016.
